author: stas
msg: remove the traces of 1.99_xx, we are now at 2.0.xx

author: mullan
msg: If an application uses more than one distinct class loader to load classes
which in turn create or validate XML Signatures, the first signature will be
generated/validated without any problems, but calls from Objects loaded by
subsequent class loaders throw an InvocationTargetException.

author: chirino
msg: Robert Newson, great job finding and putting together a test case for this.
